items.title: Lawmakers Suggest Follow-Up Boat Strike Could Be a War Crime
items.summary: Top Republicans have joined Democrats in demanding answers about the escalating military campaign the Trump administration says is aimed at targeting drug traffickers.

items.title: Ukraine’s top negotiator resigns, but peace talks carry on.
The Political Price Shock of Data Centers and Electric Bills
items.summary: Democrats zeroed in on utilities and affordability to win Republican support in upset elections in Georgia and Virginia. Can the same playbook work in 2026?

items.title: Remembering WW2 Camps, Japanese Americans Fight Trump’s Immigration Crackdown
items.summary: Japanese Americans are seeing parallels between the government’s incarceration of their families during World War II and the current detention of Latinos.

items.title: 4 Dead After Shooting at Banquet Hall in California
items.summary: The shooting in Stockton, a city in California’s Central Valley, left 11 others wounded. The authorities said they were looking for a suspect.

items.title: Trump Frees Fraudster Just Days Into Seven-Year Prison Sentence
items.summary: David Gentile had been found guilty for his role in what prosecutors described as a $1.6 billion scheme that defrauded thousands of investors.

items.title: Four killed and 11 wounded in shooting at child’s party in California, officials say
items.summary: <p>Victims who died range from ‘juveniles to adults’ in attack on banquet hall in Stockton, county sheriff’s office says</p><p>Four people have died and eleven were wounded after a shooting at a family gathering in northern <a href="https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/california">California</a> on Saturday night, police said.</p><p>The victims who died, who range in age from eight to 21 , were taken to local hospitals, Heather Brent, a spokesperson for the San Joaquin County sheriff’s office, said. “What we have confirmed at this time is that there was a banquet hall where a family was celebrating.”</p> <a href="https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/2025/nov/30/stockton-banquet-hall-shooting-california">Continue reading...</a>

items.title: Winter storm brings foot of snow to midwest over busiest US travel weekend
items.summary: <p>Plane skidded off runway and 45 cars were piled up as 53 million were under winter weather alerts over Thanksgiving</p><p>A <a href="https://www.theguardian.com/lifeandstyle/thanksgiving">Thanksgiving</a> weekend storm system brought over a foot of snow and strong winds across the US midwest and thunderstorms across the south, as <a href="https://www.nbcnews.com/weather/winter-weather/winter-weather-threatening-holiday-travel-us-weekend-rcna246428">53 million</a> people from South Dakota to New York were under <a href="https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/2025/nov/27/thanksgiving-storm-travel-weather">winter weather alerts</a>.</p><p>Over the weekend, ahead of one of the busiest travel days of the year on Sunday, a 45-car pile-up occurred on interstate 78 in Indiana and a Delta Air Lines plane skidded off the runway in Des Moines, Iowa, during landing.</p> <a href="https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/2025/nov/30/midwest-winter-storm-thanksgiving-travel">Continue reading...</a>
